meanings.definition: (スペイン語) イトスギカズラ属の植物の総称
meanings.english_definition: (Spanish) Any plant of the genus Erodium.

examples.sentence: El alfilerillo es común en los campos de España.
examples.translation: Alfilerillo is common in the fields of Spain.

etymology.value: Diminutive of 'alfiler' (pin), referring to the seed pods' resemblance to pins.
